message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500.

Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $9,500 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product. Let's try to find a middle ground.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 simply won't work for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,000. This would still be a good deal for you, and it's the closest I can come to your offer.
